definition[0]: software that is being tested by people who will use it, to see if it works properly
definition[1]: a VERSION of software that has been tested by the people who developed it and then given to a specially chosen group of users to find out if there are any more small problems with it, before it is made available to the public
example[0]: Even with this beta version, no major problems have surfaced, so we expect the release version to be very solid.
